articles.author: BQ Desk
articles.title: Micron To Invest $825 Million To Build Chip Assembly, Testing Facility In Gujarat - BQ Prime
articles.description: The deal strengthens technology ties between the U.S. and India amid American standoff with China on chip technology.
articles.content:
The Indian government approved the facility before Prime Minister Narendra Modi left for the U.S. visit, Reuters reported.
Microns investment to set up assembly and test manufacturing in India will … [+1401 chars]
